com.facebook.buck.core.model.targetgraph

Class TargetGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.util.graph.DirectedAcyclicGraph<TargetNode<?>>
      • com.facebook.buck.core.model.targetgraph.TargetGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TraversableGraph<TargetNode<?>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VersionedTargetGraph

    public class TargetGraph
extends DirectedAcyclicGraph<TargetNode<?>>
    Represents the graph of TargetNodes constructed by parsing the build files.

      • getExactOptional

        public Optional<TargetNode<?>> getExactOptional(BuildTarget target)
        Returns the target node for the exact given target, if it exists in the graph.

        If given a flavored target, and the target graph doesn't contain that flavored target, this method will always return null, unlike getOptional, which may return the node for a differently flavored target (VersionedTargetGraph#getInternal).

      • getAll

        public Iterable<TargetNode<?>> getAll(Iterable<BuildTarget> targets)

      • getSubgraph

        public <T> TargetGraph getSubgraph(Iterable<? extends TargetNode<? extends T>> roots)
        Get the subgraph of the the current graph containing the passed in roots and all of their transitive dependencies as nodes. Edges between the included nodes are preserved.
        Parameters:
        roots - An iterable containing the roots of the new subgraph.
        Returns:
        A subgraph of the current graph.
